law.text: There shall be established in the Department for Public Health, Cabinet for Health and Family Services, a vital statistics program which shall maintain and operate the only official system of vital statistics in the Commonwealth.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 428, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 379, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990.
